CustomField.description: To connect ODS Admissions Application data fields (EnrollmentrxRx__Enrollment_Opportunity__c object) to the new Admissions Application created in EDA. This will allow for any future updates needed to Interaction data based on Application ERX data to be connected and confidently matched. We can also audit for possible duplicates if the EDA processor is turned on during our upload process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To connect ODS Admissions Application data fields (EnrollmentrxRx__Enrollment_Opportunity__c object) to the new Admissions Application created in EDA. This will allow for any future updates needed to Interaction data based on Application ERX data to be connected and confidently matched. We can also audit for possible duplicates if the EDA processor is turned on during our upload process.
CustomField.label: Application ID ERx
